article.title: Begin Again
article.author: David Li
article.excerpt: But on a Wednesday, in a cafe, I watched it begin again.

authors.bio: Software Engineer @aws, dreamer, adventurer, and always seeking the next challenge. Available for friendship and (especailly) drinks. All writings are purely for fun.
